hint.fetchOnDeploy: Trigger a request immediately on deploy
hint.staleAllow: On fetch error, return last successful cached data

tips.source: Lists are loaded from the official DWD pollen feed. Alternatively you can set msg.regionId or msg.partregionId.
tips.staleAllow: If disabled, the node will error out when a request fails.

help.title: DWD Pollen1
help.desc: Retrieves pollen risk information from Deutscher Wetterdienst (DWD).
help.flow1: Select Region, then choose available Subregions.
help.flow2: Optionally enable "Fetch on deploy" and set "Auto-refresh" (seconds).
help.flow3: At runtime, msg.regionId/msg.partregionId can override the configuration.

runtime.errorMissingRegionOrPart: Please configure a region or partregion (regionId/partregionId).
